example_sentence_english: I want to put the book here.

example_sentence_italian: Sto mettendo il libro sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: I am putting the book on the table.

notes: past participle, irregular root, masculine singular
example_sentence_english: I put it in my bag.

notes: past participle, irregular root, feminine singular
example_sentence_english: I put it on the table.

notes: past participle, irregular root, masculine plural
example_sentence_english: I put them in order.

notes: past participle, irregular root, feminine plural
example_sentence_english: I put them away.
I put salt.

We put on the music.

example_sentence_italian: Voi mettete i piatti in tavola.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) put the plates on the table.

example_sentence_italian: Loro mettono le chiavi sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: They put the keys on the table.
I was always putting too much salt.

translation_english: he was putting/she was putting/you (formal) were putting
example_sentence_english: She was often putting on a scarf.

example_sentence_italian: Noi mettevamo da parte i soldi.
example_sentence_english: We were putting money aside.
You (plural) were always putting on glasses.

example_sentence_italian: Loro mettevano i libri in ordine.
example_sentence_english: They were putting the books in order.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'messo'
example_sentence_italian: Ho messo il telefono in carica.
example_sentence_english: I have put the phone on charge.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'messo'
example_sentence_english: Have you put the cream on?

translation_english: he has put/she has put/you (formal) have put
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'
example_sentence_italian: Ha messo la sveglia alle sette.
example_sentence_english: He has set the alarm for seven.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'messo'

example_sentence_english: We have put the suitcases in the car.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'messo'
example_sentence_italian: Avete messo a posto la stanza.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) have put the room in order.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'messo'
